title: Calories in Green Seedless Grapes
meta_description: Discover calories in green seedless grapes per 100 g, including carbs, sugars, fiber, protein, and fat details for easy tracking.
assumptions: Fresh, raw green seedless grapes; typical variety like Thompson; washed and ready to eat.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by variety, ripeness, growing conditions, and storage; check labels or apps for specifics.

quick_answer.text: 100 g of green seedless grapes provides ~69 kcal, mostly from natural sugars.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in 100 g green seedless grapes?
Are green seedless grapes low in sugar?
faqs.a: They have about 16 g sugars per 100 g, mostly natural fructose.

faqs.q: What's the fiber content in green grapes?
faqs.a: Around 0.9 g dietary fiber per 100 g, aiding digestion.

faqs.q: Do green seedless grapes have fat or cholesterol?
faqs.a: Negligible fat (0.2 g) and 0 mg cholesterol per 100 g.

faqs.q: How do calories compare to red grapes?
faqs.a: Similar; red varieties are about 70 kcal per 100 g.
